titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Roland F. Pease Papers, 1831-2005 (bulk 1940-2000)
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Jennifer Palmentiero March 2006

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Materials relating to the life and work of author and art collector, Roland Pease. Of particular interest is material related to his involvement with the Tibor de Nagy Gallery in New York City, as well as his work for several religious and fraternal organizations, such as the Society of Mayflower Descendants, the New England Society, and St. James' Church.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Writer, editor, art collector born in Boston, MA, 11 December 1921. Son of Roland F. Pease and Mary Hallett Pease. Father of poet and publisher Deborah Saltonstall Pease and Roland F. Pease, Jr.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, writings, photographs and other material relating to Pease's work and family life as well as his civic and religious affiliations and connections to the art world. Of particular interest are materials relating to his friendship with Tibor de Nagy and his involvement with the Tibor de Nagy Gallery in New York City. Also of note is a large cache of genealogical material relating to the Pease, Folsom and Saltonstall families. The collection also includes material relating to his involvement several civic and religious organizations including the Society of Mayflower Descendants, the New England Society and St. James' Church in New York City.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Contains some restricted material. The rest of the collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection processed by Laura Streett, February 2005. Last updated, April 2005.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Roland F. Pease in several accessions, 1999-2005

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Archives and Special Collections, Vassar College Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged in 8 series, and chronologically within each of those series.
